What's appening?

Bye, Bye Berlin. We will be back in summer!

It was a pleasure to be at the Berlin Fashion Week. To meet new brands and lots of nice people and of course to see our customers having a successful show! more ›

German sales team DENHAM the Jeanmaker also using Apps4Fashion

After the sales team at the DENHAM HQ in Amsterdam, we are happy to welcome the German team as well on our mobile sales platform Apps4Fashion. more ›

The Journey continues. Next stop: Berlin!

After a successful and joyful visit to Pitti Uomo in Florence Apps4Fashion will be present in Berlin this week during the Berlin Fashion Week. more ›

Sales team No-Excess ready for AW16 pre-sale with Apps4Fashion

By sharing some tips and tricks for quick and easy order entry, creating order proposals for key-accounts, pre-selecting favourite styles and best sellers the international sales team of No-Excess is well prepared to go out there with their sales app and sell, sell, sell. more ›

Haglöfs goes digital with Apps4Fashion

After a thorough and detailed inventory of the internal needs and requirements as well as detailed market research Haglöfs committed to Apps4Fashion to launch their first digital work book and mobile order entry tool for FW16. more ›

Oh! By Kopenhagen Fur chooses Apps4Fashion

Oh! By Kopenhagen Fur has chosen Apps4Fashion for a professional, efficient and innovative mobile order entry.

Wanna get super sized?! Apps4Fashion now also available on the brandnew 12.9 inch iPad Pro

Like us, Apple is also constantly innovating. To make your product presentations with Apps4Fashion even more impressive to your customers and keep pushing your sales orders, we kindly asked Tim (Cook) for a larger iPad. And here it is! more ›

Apps4Fashion welcomes Abacus Sportswear

We are happy to announce that Abacus® Sportswear has chosen Apps4Fashion for their digital workbook and mobile order entry tool.

A4F welcomes GAI + LISVA: Nordic coolness meets Dutch innovation

Apps4Fashion and Agidon happily announce that another contemporary Danish Womenswear brand is enjoying the benefits of using the innovative mobile sales tablet application Apps4Fashion. We look forward to a pleasant cooperation. more ›
